library(htmltools)

masonry_grid <- function(...) {
  return(div(
    class = "masonry-wrapper",
    div(class = "masonry", ...)
  ))
}

masonry_item <- function(
  src = NULL,
  title = NULL,
  description = NULL,
  url = NULL
) {
  image <- img(src = src)
  if (!is.null(url)) {
    image <- a(
      href = url,
      class = "card-hover",
      img(src = src))
  }
  return(div(class = "masonry-item",
    div(
      class = "masonry-content",
      image,
      h3(class = "masonry-title", title),
      p(class = "masonry-description", description)
    )
  ))
}
